name: Zicon Consulting
membership: Nihil. We are doing individual work.
goal: Our company represents the interests of Brazilian clients seeking resources for research and development. Our technology division, for example, researching a mechanism for purifying the water with the expected durability of 100 tons of purified water. We also represent a new company that has developed new technology for the treatment of sewage and effluents.
